tools.name: convert_to_markdown
tools.description:
Converts various input formats (HTTP/HTTPS web pages, local files, and data URIs) into structured Markdown.

    Args:
        input_source: The source to convert (e.g., "https://example.com", "file:///path/to/file.html", or "data:text/html,...").
        preserve_structure: If True, retains original formatting (default: True).

    Returns:
        A string containing the structured Markdown output.

    Raises:
        ValueError: If the input source is invalid or unsupported.
        httpx.HTTPStatusError: If fetching web content fails.
        FileNotFoundError: If local file cannot be found.
        PermissionError: If local file cannot be accessed.

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert Valid Web Page to Markdown
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具可以从有效的HTTP网页转换为结构化的Markdown

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert Local HTML File with Preserve Structure On
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具可以将本地HTML文件正确转换为Markdown并保留原始结构

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Attempt to Convert Non-Existent Remote URL
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具在远程URL不存在或无法访问时是否抛出HTTP错误

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具在指定的本地文件路径无效时是否抛出FileNotFoundError

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: File not found: file:///path/to/nonexistent/file.html

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert Read-Only File in Restricted Directory
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试工具在尝试读取受权限限制的文件时是否抛出PermissionError
